013package org.apache.juneau.assertions;
014
015import java.io.*;
016import java.time.*;
017import java.time.temporal.*;
018import java.util.function.*;
019
020import org.apache.juneau.common.internal.*;
021import org.apache.juneau.cp.*;
022import org.apache.juneau.internal.*;
023import org.apache.juneau.serializer.*;
024
025/**
026 * Used for fluent assertion calls against {@link ZonedDateTime} objects.
027 *
028 * <h5 class='section'>Example:</h5>
029 * <p class='bjava'>
030 *    <jc>// Validates the response expiration is after the current date.</jc>
031 *    <jv>client</jv>
032 *       .get(<jsf>URL</jsf>)
033 *       .run()
034 *       .getHeader(<js>"Expires"</js>).asDateHeader().assertZonedDateTime().isAfterNow();
035 * </p>
036 *
037 *
038 * <h5 class='section'>Test Methods:</h5>
039 * <p>
040 * <ul class='javatree'>
041 *    <li class='jc'>{@link FluentZonedDateTimeAssertion}
042 *    <ul class='javatreec'>
043 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentZonedDateTimeAssertion#is(ZonedDateTime,ChronoUnit) is(ZonedDateTime,ChronoUnit)}
044 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentZonedDateTimeAssertion#isAfter(ZonedDateTime) isAfter(ZonedDateTime)}
045 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentZonedDateTimeAssertion#isAfterNow() isAfterNow()}
046 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentZonedDateTimeAssertion#isBefore(ZonedDateTime) isBefore(ZonedDateTime)}
047 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentZonedDateTimeAssertion#isBeforeNow() isBeforeNow()}
048 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentZonedDateTimeAssertion#isBetween(ZonedDateTime,ZonedDateTime) isBetween(ZonedDateTime,ZonedDateTime)}
049 *    </ul>
050 *    <li class='jc'>{@link FluentComparableAssertion}
051 *    <ul class='javatreec'>
052 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentComparableAssertion#isGt(Comparable) isGt(Comparable)}
053 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentComparableAssertion#isGte(Comparable) isGte(Comparable)}
054 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentComparableAssertion#isLt(Comparable) isLt(Comparable)}
055 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentComparableAssertion#isLte(Comparable) isLte(Comparable)}
056 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentComparableAssertion#isBetween(Comparable,Comparable) isBetween(Comparable,Comparable)}
057  *   </ul>
058 *    <li class='jc'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion}
059 *    <ul class='javatreec'>
060 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isExists() isExists()}
061 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#is(Object) is(Object)}
062 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#is(Predicate) is(Predicate)}
063 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isNot(Object) isNot(Object)}
064 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isAny(Object...) isAny(Object...)}
065 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isNotAny(Object...) isNotAny(Object...)}
066 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isNull() isNull()}
067 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isNotNull() isNotNull()}
068 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isString(String) isString(String)}
069 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isJson(String) isJson(String)}
070 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isSame(Object) isSame(Object)}
071 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isSameJsonAs(Object) isSameJsonAs(Object)}
072 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isSameSortedJsonAs(Object) isSameSortedJsonAs(Object)}
073 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isSameSerializedAs(Object, WriterSerializer) isSameSerializedAs(Object, WriterSerializer)}
074 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isType(Class) isType(Class)}
075 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isExactType(Class) isExactType(Class)}
076 *    </ul>
077 * </ul>
078 *
079 * <h5 class='section'>Transform Methods:</h5>
080 * <p>
081 * <ul class='javatree'>
082 *    <li class='jc'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion}
083 *    <ul class='javatreec'>
084 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#asString() asString()}
085 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#asString(WriterSerializer) asString(WriterSerializer)}
086 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#asString(Function) asString(Function)}
087 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#asJson() asJson()}
088 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#asJsonSorted() asJsonSorted()}
089 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#asTransformed(Function) asApplied(Function)}
090 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#asAny() asAny()}
091 * </ul>
092 * </ul>
093 *
094 * <h5 class='section'>Configuration Methods:</h5>
095 * <p>
096 * <ul class='javatree'>
097 *    <li class='jc'>{@link Assertion}
098 *    <ul class='javatreec'>
099 *       <li class='jm'>{@link Assertion#setMsg(String, Object...) setMsg(String, Object...)}
100 *       <li class='jm'>{@link Assertion#setOut(PrintStream) setOut(PrintStream)}
101 *       <li class='jm'>{@link Assertion#setSilent() setSilent()}
102 *       <li class='jm'>{@link Assertion#setStdOut() setStdOut()}
103 *       <li class='jm'>{@link Assertion#setThrowable(Class) setThrowable(Class)}
104 *    </ul>
105 * </ul>
106 *
107 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
108 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/JuneauEcosystemOverview">Juneau Ecosystem Overview</a>
109 * </ul>
110 *
111 * @param <R> The return type.
112 */
113@FluentSetters(returns="FluentZonedDateTimeAssertion<R>")
114public class FluentZonedDateTimeAssertion<R> extends FluentComparableAssertion<ZonedDateTime,R> {
115
116   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
117   // Static
118   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
119
120   private static final Messages MESSAGES = Messages.of(FluentZonedDateTimeAssertion.class, "Messages");
121   private static final String
122      MSG_unexpectedValue = MESSAGES.getString("unexpectedValue"),
123      MSG_valueWasNotAfterExpected = MESSAGES.getString("valueWasNotAfterExpected"),
124      MSG_valueWasNotBeforeExpected = MESSAGES.getString("valueWasNotBeforeExpected");
125
126   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
127   // Instance
128   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
129
130   /**
131    * Constructor.
132    *
133    * @param value
134    *    The object being tested.
135    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk>.
136    * @param returns
137    *    The object to return after a test method is called.
138    *    <br>If <jk>null</jk>, the test method returns this object allowing multiple test method calls to be
139    * used on the same assertion.
140    */
141   public FluentZonedDateTimeAssertion(ZonedDateTime value, R returns) {
142      this(null, value, returns);
143   }
144
145   /**
146    * Chained constructor.
147    *
148    * <p>
149    * Used when transforming one assertion into another so that the assertion config can be used by the new assertion.
150    *
151    * @param creator
152    *    The assertion that created this assertion.
153    *    <br>Should be <jk>null</jk> if this is the top-level assertion.
154    * @param value
155    *    The object being tested.
156    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk>.
157    * @param returns
158    *    The object to return after a test method is called.
159    *    <br>If <jk>null</jk>, the test method returns this object allowing multiple test method calls to be
160    * used on the same assertion.
161    */
162   public FluentZonedDateTimeAssertion(Assertion creator, ZonedDateTime value, R returns) {
163      super(creator, value, returns);
164   }
165
166   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
167   // Test methods
168   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
169
170   /**
171    * Asserts that the value equals the specified value at the specified precision.
172    *
173    * @param value The value to check against.
174    * @param precision The precision (e.g. {@link ChronoUnit#SECONDS}.
175    * @return The fluent return object.
176    * @throws AssertionError If assertion failed.
177    */
178   public R is(ZonedDateTime value, ChronoUnit precision) throws AssertionError {
179      Utils.assertArgNotNull("precision", precision);
180      var v = orElse(null);
181      if (valueIsNull() && value == null)
182         return returns();
183      if (valueIsNotNull() && value != null) {
184         var d = Duration.between(value(), value);
185         if (d.compareTo(precision.getDuration()) <= 0)
186            return returns();
187      }
188      throw error(MSG_unexpectedValue, value, v);
189   }
190
191   /**
192    * Asserts that the value is after the specified value.
193    *
194    * @param value The values to check against.
195    * @return The fluent return object.
196    * @throws AssertionError If assertion failed.
197    */
198   public R isAfter(ZonedDateTime value) throws AssertionError {
199      Utils.assertArgNotNull("value", value);
200      if (! (value().isAfter(value)))
201         throw error(MSG_valueWasNotAfterExpected, value, value());
202      return returns();
203   }
204
205   /**
206    * Asserts that the value is after the current date.
207    *
208    * @return The fluent return object.
209    * @throws AssertionError If assertion failed.
210    */
211   public R isAfterNow() throws AssertionError {
212      return isAfter(ZonedDateTime.now());
213   }
214
215   /**
216    * Asserts that the value is before the specified value.
217    *
218    * @param value The values to check against.
219    * @return The fluent return object.
220    * @throws AssertionError If assertion failed.
221    */
222   public R isBefore(ZonedDateTime value) throws AssertionError {
223      Utils.assertArgNotNull("value", value);
224      if (! (value().isBefore(value)))
225         throw error(MSG_valueWasNotBeforeExpected, value, value());
226      return returns();
227   }
228
229   /**
230    * Asserts that the value is before the current date.
231    *
232    * @return The fluent return object.
233    * @throws AssertionError If assertion failed.
234    */
235   public R isBeforeNow() throws AssertionError {
236      return isBefore(ZonedDateTime.now());
237   }
238
239   /**
240    * Asserts that the value is between (inclusive) the specified upper and lower values.
241    *
242    * @param lower The lower value to check against.
243    * @param upper The upper value to check against.
244    * @return The fluent return object.
245    * @throws AssertionError If assertion failed.
246    */
247   public R isBetween(ZonedDateTime lower, ZonedDateTime upper) throws AssertionError {
248      isExists();
249      Utils.assertArgNotNull("lower", lower);
250      Utils.assertArgNotNull("upper", upper);
251      isLte(upper);
252      isGte(lower);
253      return returns();
254   }
255
256   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
257   // Fluent setters
258   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
259
260   // <FluentSetters>
261
262   @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.assertions.Assertion */
263   public FluentZonedDateTimeAssertion<R> setMsg(String msg, Object...args) {
264      super.setMsg(msg, args);
265      return this;
266   }
267
268   @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.assertions.Assertion */
269   public FluentZonedDateTimeAssertion<R> setOut(PrintStream value) {
270      super.setOut(value);
271      return this;
272   }
273
274   @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.assertions.Assertion */
275   public FluentZonedDateTimeAssertion<R> setSilent() {
276      super.setSilent();
277      return this;
278   }
279
280   @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.assertions.Assertion */
281   public FluentZonedDateTimeAssertion<R> setStdOut() {
282      super.setStdOut();
283      return this;
284   }
285
286   @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.assertions.Assertion */
287   public FluentZonedDateTimeAssertion<R> setThrowable(Class<? extends java.lang.RuntimeException> value) {
288      super.setThrowable(value);
289      return this;
290   }
291
292   // </FluentSetters>
293}
